remarks: Obsolete version of ~ isghm as of 15-Mar-2020.  Membership in the set of group homomorphisms from ` G ` to ` H ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
elghomOLD.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
elghomOLD.2 $e |- W = ran H $.
elghomOLD $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp ) -> ( F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) <-> ( F : X --> W /\ A. x e. X A. y e. X ( ( F ` x ) H ( F ` y ) ) = ( F ` ( x G y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d X x y $.
